      abstract ISegmentedAsset  IAssetManager.createHLSSegmentedAsset(HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams assetParams)
      Same as IAssetManager.createHLSSegmentedAssetAsync(HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams), but not blocking Use HLSAssetBuilder to assemble the parameters for the HLS asset This method is blocking and will throw an runtime exception if called from the UI thread
